name: 2D Platform Template - Unity
description:
This sample stage was created to test and show my 2D Platformer Template.
Some things are still placeholders, and they will be replaced with sprites with new updates. Also, new mechanics will be add over time too.

Don't distribute this game in other sites without posting a link for this page, and giving credits.

Credits Programming
  • Adriano Veríssimo: programmer member of the Magical Dog Entertainment team.
    Portfolio: Itch.io, LinkedIn, Twitter
Sprites
  • Sunny Land: created by Ansimuz, and got in the Unity Asset Store.
    Click here to view the asset's page.
Musics

    Portfolio: Web site
